text:
Th-That... I'm sorry...
The audition... didn't go well...

Good job, Kiriko.
No need to apologize.

The unit is getting busier,
I might have pushed you too hard, sorry.

...That bandage,
It still hurts, doesn't it?

This is...
Not because of an injury...

Th-This is like... a charm...
I feel like... it hides my... not-so-good parts...

I see...
Even so, your usual performance is──...

Th-That's... my voice and movements...
What if they bother others... I thought...

So, it wasn't your usual performance...
Thanks for telling me.

...Your kindness, Kiriko, is also your charm in my opinion.
I want to cherish it and work together with you.

...Producer-san,
It's the first time I've been told such things...
